column4: If I kill networkManager, will I loose internet? The little f***er is using 100% of one core doing nothing
there is no need for that language please.
if you have to star out a word - don't use it
okay, but what is the answer to my question+
I didn't read your question as I lost interests as soon as I saw your use of language
depends, mostly if you kill it and re-spawn it it will be fine
you should be able to kill it and respawn it before it re-checks for a lease.
I managed to start my cpufan, maybe that will cool it down
cpu temperature doesn't make it use more/less cpu
if network manager is using %100 cpu, cooling it won't make it use less
Since when? Every decent intel chip throttles itself if it is too warm
limiting it's processor scalability is not % utilization
if it's 1mhz or 1000000mhz, network manager shouldn't be using %100
